dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT sh.shipment_xid shipment_gid, sr.remark_text, gu.gl_user_xid insert_user, TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(sr.insert_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY HH:MI PM') note_time FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN shipment_remark sr ON sh.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.INTERNAL NOTES' INNER JOIN gl_user gu ON sr.insert_user = gu.gl_user_gid WHERE sh.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID ORDER BY sr.insert_date ASC
